tidbits.title: Pierogi Paradise
tidbits.description: Indulge in Poland's love for pierogi, delicious dumplings with various fillings. Each region has its own twist, making it a culinary adventure across the country.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country boasts natural beauty, including the Tatra Mountains, Bialowieza Forest, and Mazury Lakes, attracting outdoor enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: Amber Capital of the World
tidbits.description: Poland is renowned as the Amber Capital of the World. Gdansk, in particular, is famous for its amber markets, offering unique jewelry and artifacts.
